Elections
=========

**May 2, 2026 General Election:**
---------------------------------

The purpose of this General Election is to fill (3) THREE At Large Council Seats.

Candidate Packets and Applications for a Place on the Ballot may be picked up from the City Secretary’s Office starting January 14, 2026. The City Secretary’s Office is located in Reno City Hall at 160 Blackburn Street, Reno, Texas 75462. 

 

**First Day to File as a candidate is January 14, 2026.**

**Last Day to File as a candidate is February 13, 2026 by 5:00 P.M.**

Candidate Packet and Information:
---------------------------------

    \*[Frequently asked questions.](https://www.renotexas.us/DocumentCenter/View/1728/2025-ELECTION-FAQ)

Voting Information
------------------

* Election Day May 2, 2026
* 7:00 am UNTIL 7:00 pm at Reno City Hall 160 Blackburn Street Reno, TX 75462
* [Notice of deadline to file application for place on ballot.](https://www.renotexas.us/DocumentCenter/View/1784/NOTICE-OF-DEADLINE--TO-FILE-AN-APPLICATION-FOR-A-PLACE-ON-BALLOT)
* Resolution No. 513.23 Ordering May 2, 2026 General Election
* Drawing order of names on ballot notice
* [Candidates to be placed on the May 2, 2026 Ballot](https://www.renotexas.us/DocumentCenter/View/1784/NOTICE-OF-DEADLINE--TO-FILE-AN-APPLICATION-FOR-A-PLACE-ON-BALLOT)
* Notice of May 2, 2026 General Election
* [Order of Cancellation of May 3, 2025 General Election](https://www.renotexas.us/DocumentCenter/View/1748/order-cancellation-2025)

Forms
-----

* Visit [www.sos.state.tx.us](http://www.sos.state.tx.us/)
* For military and overseas voters-[Federal Voting Assistant Program](http://votetexas.gov/military-overseas-voters/)

Voter Registration Instructions
-------------------------------

To register to vote or change your existing information please complete a Voter Registration Application. When completing the application please follow the following instructions:

* Complete the application in full either online or print
* Verify all information on application is correct
* Sign the application when completed
* Mail the completed, signed application to:  
  Elections Division  
  Secretary of State  
  P.O. Box 12060  
  Austin, TX 78711-2060

Texas Secretary of State voter registration link: <http://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/voter/reqvr.shtml>

Polling Location and Time for City of Reno Elections:
-----------------------------------------------------

* **Reno City Hall Council Chambers**
* 160 Blackburn Street Reno, TX 75462
* 7:00 am to 7:00 pm Saturday May 2, 2026

Early Voting by personal appearance will be conducted each weekday at:
----------------------------------------------------------------------

* **Reno City Hall Main Office**
* 160 Blackburn Street Reno, TX 75462
* Between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. beginning on:

**May 2, 2026 General Election:**
---------------------------------

* The purpose of this General Election is to fill THREE (3) At Large Council Seats.
* Candidate Packets and Applications for a Place on the Ballot may be picked up from the City Secretary’s Office starting January 10, 2026. The City Secretary’s Office is located in Reno City Hall at 160 Blackburn Street, Reno, Texas 75462.

[Candidates to be placed on the May 2, 2026 Ballot](https://www.renotexas.us/DocumentCenter/View/1778/Candidates-to-be-placed-on-the-May-2-2026-ballot)

Contact the Lamar County Elections Administrator for polling locations for other elections:

<http://www.co.lamar.tx.us/default.aspx?Lamar_County/Elections>
